title: Energy Healing Transmissions | Sanctuary Of Sophia
description: Energy Healing transmissions, online, in person Glastonbury and Exmoor. Healing, womb, trauma, grief, life transitions. Deep shamanic journey with Angie Twydall
cleaned_text: top of page ENERGY HEALING TRANSMISSIONS These sessions are carried out online via zoom live directly by Angie sessions are 1-1.5 hours Fees from £60-£90 Concessions available for those on single low incomes, please just ask. Open new dimensional gateways of healing with long-distance Energy Transmissions and powerful Shamanic Ceremonies that take place in your own home. Healing Ceremonies Offered:- - Abortion: Sacred Healing Ceremony - Feminine Power - Healing Past Life Trauma - Reclaiming Feminine Power: Wound of the Witches - Hysterectomy: Sacred Healing Ceremony - Miscarriage: Sacred Healing Ceremony - Sexual Abuse: Healing the Grail Wound Call 01598 753525 to book or use our chat box on this website. bottom of page
